rows.label: qst104907_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh... For a handsome gentleman,
even a cheap ring becomes a
top-quality engagement ring...!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0002
rows.name: My apologies. I got carried away...

rows.label: qst104907_msg0003
rows.name:
Please tell me in detail how
you handled the legendary ring
after you obtained it!!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0021
rows.name: What should we tell her?

rows.label: qst104907_msg0022
rows.name:
Zeke and Rex were
complaining about the cold.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0023
rows.name:
Zeke and Rex put on the
ring and swore friendship.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0041
rows.name:
It was hard to find!
...Is that how it was?

rows.label: qst104907_msg0051
rows.name:
Hmm hmm hmm! Oh ho ho! I
see, I see! It must have
been a lovely sight!!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0071
rows.name: I understand. Thank you.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0072
rows.name: ...The theme of my book is decided.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0073
rows.name:
U-Ugh... My arm... my hand...
is roaring... telling me to
pick up the pen...!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0074
rows.name:
I'm just going to write
a bit! Please wait!!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0075
rows.name: ...Phew. It's done~~

rows.label: qst104907_msg0101
rows.name: It's a flower encyclopedia!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0102
rows.name:
Uhm... Even after hearing your
story, I couldn't clearly
picture a beautiful scene...

rows.label: qst104907_msg0103
rows.name:
So I went with my original
plan and wrote a book about
beautiful flowers~

rows.label: qst104907_msg0201
rows.name: It's a book about aesthetic gentlemen!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0202
rows.name:
As I listened to your stories,
my concept expanded into a tale
spun by handsome gentlemen...

rows.label: qst104907_msg0203
rows.name:
I ended up writing a book
full of gentlemen, different
from my original plan!!!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0204
rows.name:
It's a masterpiece! Rest
assured! I've packed it with
everything I find charming!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0301
rows.name:
Once the book is done, it will be
in bookstores, so please buy it!

rows.label: qst104907_msg0302
rows.name: Thank you for teaching me so much~

rows.label: qst104907_msg0303
rows.name:
I was able to talk a lot
with handsome gentlemen, it
was a feast for the eyes.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0304
rows.name:
...Just so you know, I
am not a gentleman.

rows.label: qst104907_msg0305
rows.name: What!? You're a woman!?

rows.label: qst104907_msg0306
rows.name:
To think a beautiful woman
dressed as a man existed...
Ah... beauty is a sin...

rows.label: qst104907_msg0401
rows.name:
Haa... I see... I'll be awaiting a
report from the handsome gentleman~
